message: Let's split the money evenly. Fair is fair, right?
I'll take the lead, you can follow.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it closer to your previous proposal, but with a bit more fairness for me.
You're getting closer to my price, but I'm not there yet.
I'm trying to be reasonable here. Let's meet in the middle and end this game.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. Meet my price or walk away.
Okay, I'm willing to go lower, but this is my final offer.  It's better than nothing!
